name: Samurai Deflect
description:
In Samurai Deflect play as a patient samurai that defeats his opponents though reflecting their arrows straight back at them! 

This game was produced as part of the one week long  1-button Jam 2021 between myself and an art friend (see credits)

The premise of the jam is that only one input button is allowed (including the main menu!) and the theme is "counter".
